name: Foretold Flames
desc:
You foretell a creature's impending demise in flames, sealing it into the near future. The next time this creature would take fire damage, the flames intensify and deal an additional 1d10 fire damage per AP spent on this spell. The spell then ends.

Casting this spell again before it has triggered ends the first spell without effect.
empower: If the source of fire damage requires a saving throw, the creature has disadvantage on its saving throw.
